title: Invade Croatia
desc:
Post 939
- You own Croatia. This makes you **Happy.**
- Every other player in this game happens to live in Croatia, you collect all of their cards and give them back to the players in any way. (John has <:red:1106234051129507932> 9 and <:yellow:1106234135384699023> 2 and Bob has <:green:1106234108042031166> 2, you can choose who gets what cards.)
